nz.co.jedsimson.lgp.core.evolution.operators

Class SelectionOperator<TProgram,TOutput extends Output<TProgram>>

  • nz.co.jedsimson.lgp.core.evolution.operators.SelectionOperator<TProgram,TOutput>
  • Type Parameters:
    TProgram - The type of programs being selected.
    TOutput - The type of the program output(s).
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryTournamentSelection, TournamentSelection

    public class SelectionOperator<TProgram,TOutput extends Output<TProgram>>
implements Module

    A search operator used during evolution to select a subset of individuals from a population.

    The subset of individuals determined by the search operator are used when applying the class RecombinationOperator and class MutationOperator to move through the search space of LGP programs for the problem being solved.

    Generally, it is expected that that the individuals selected will be removed from the original population, and clones of those individuals returned. These individuals can then be subjected to recombination/mutation before being introduced back into a population.

    See Also:
    class RecombinationOperator, class MutationOperator

        A search operator used during evolution to select a subset of individuals from a population.

        The subset of individuals determined by the search operator are used when applying the class RecombinationOperator and class MutationOperator to move through the search space of LGP programs for the problem being solved.

        Generally, it is expected that that the individuals selected will be removed from the original population, and clones of those individuals returned. These individuals can then be subjected to recombination/mutation before being introduced back into a population.
